casebody.data:
In re Application of Hayes.

[Cite as In re Application of Hayes (1998), 81 Ohio St.3d 88.]

(No. 97-407 Submitted December 2, 1997 Decided February 18, 1998.) *89Warren Rosman and Robert Archibald, for the Cleveland and Cuyahoga County Bar Associations. Michael E. Banta, for applicant. Per Curiam.

We have thoroughly reviewed the record. The findings of fact, conclusions, and recommendation of the board have ample support, and we hereby adopt them. Applicant is unfit to practice law, and his application to register as a candidate for admission to the bar of Ohio is disapproved. Applicant is never to be admitted to the practice of law in Ohio.

Judgment' accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
